1370: Ysaac moved to Lievevrouwe kerch.C.1 after marriage.
Got married to Atghardis at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Atghardis, Wernerus, at age 21.
1371: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Uergina, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Clara, at age 24.
1374: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Thedwi, at age 25.
1377: Had a son with Atghardis, Meynolphus, at age 28.
1378: Had a son with Atghardis, Walramus, at age 29.
1384: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Saswe, at age 35.
